none-active-refs: You dont have any referrals yet.
follow-promo: Follow and don't miss out on important updates, events, and giveaways!
share-your-link: Share your referral link and get 50% of the commission from users winnings
gifts-deposit-instruction-one: To add new gifts to the inventory, send unique gifts to
gifts-deposit-instruction-two: The gift will be credited to your TON balance at the market price from the list.
gifts-deposit-instruction-three: The transfer operation is final, and the balance will be updated immediately.
stars-deposit-instruction: Stars are automatically converted to TON, and your balance will be updated instantly.
no-bets-here: There are no events in this category. Try switching to another tab.
winning-soon: The winnings are credited to your balance.
didnt-place-bet: You havent placed a bet yet.
comments-limited-one: Comments are only available to those who have placed a bet.
comments-limited-two: Only users who have placed a bet can comment.
giveaway-rules: Bet 1 TON and more for a chance to win
giveaway-description: Giveaways reward people who bet early. Everyone who bet more than 1 TON before a certain volume will get a gift ticket. There is a very limited amount of tickets, so your chances of winning are huge. The information about the giveaway and the results are posted in our chat.
redirect-deposit-text: Please go to your profile and top up your balance to continue playing.
gift-withdrawal: Your request has been successfully accepted. Your gift will arrive within a day!
create-hint-policy: You will receive 10% of the commission from winnings. Profanity is prohibited. Only English or Russian languages are allowed.
event-name: Enter the name of the event
description-hint-prediction: Indicate in which case the event leads to a “Yes” or “No” result. Be very specific. If you use a time reference, specify the time zone.
describe-event-input: Enter a detailed description of the event..
describe-deal-input: Specify the terms of the transaction and be very specific. Under what circumstances will the transaction be approved, and what are the conditions? Specify the price, cost, or service you will receive in exchange for what you want to exchange. This will help us prevent fraud and dishonest actions.
getting-gifts-hint: Specify the gift collections, model type, background type, and quantity for each of them. If the number of gifts is not specified, the default value of 1 is used.
created-events-empty-second: create a new event and come back
none-gifts-one: There are no unique gifts yet.
none-gifts-two: To add new ones, send gifts to
to-add-new-gifts: To add new ones, send gifts to
